title: Border, 1943-46-3, mid-18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Width of silk with embroidery as a border; design of flowers and leaves in outline and in solid embroidery. Stitches: couching, satin, buttonhole, surface, French knots.  Embroidery in cream on tan ground.
